entry.title: Fabelle Fire
entry.summary:
Vendor: Fabelle Luxury Chocolates
Type: Foods
Price: 350.00

Fabelle Fire is part of the exquisite Elements collection from the masters at ITC. A hand-crafted chocolate creation made with the finest ingredients, Fabelle Fire is inspired by the fire element. Infused with a delicious and intricately balanced combination of White Mousse and Ancho Chili, Fabelle Fire brings the best out of the art of chocolate making. Let your senses on an unrestrained exploration of bold new flavours with Fabelle Fire.

Key Information:

  • Main Ingredients: The Fabelle Fire variant from the Fabelle Elements collection contains a soft, creamy centre with a solid outer chocolate shell. The outer shell for Fabelle Fire has been hand-crafted with dark chocolate, and the gooey centre contains the fabulous White Mousse and Ancho Chili filling.
  • Suitable For: Fabelle Fire is an exotic and niche creation for luxury chocolate lovers who appreciate complex flavours and premium ingredients. The element of Fire inspires this Fabelle Elements chocolate, blending the fiery heat from the high-quality Ancho Chili with the velvety White Mousse. Such exciting and fresh new flavours push the boundaries of chocolate making beyond the ordinary where true chocolate lovers thrive.
  • Usage: Commemorate the special moments in life with Fabelle Fire by presenting your loved ones with Fabelle Fire on birthdays, anniversaries, and other important festivals. Fabelle Fire is also one of the best Diwali chocolate gift options this festive season. You can also purchase a personal treat for yourself to celebrate moments of individual brilliance.
  • Quantity: Each Fabelle Fire chocolate bar weighs 131g. The beautiful equilibrium of creamy goodness and soft spiciness is best enjoyed when shared with someone special.

Fabelle Fire is part of the Fabelle Elements collection of chocolates. These chocolates have been created by drawing inspiration from all the five elements – Earth, Water, Fire, Wood and Air. Keeping in line with the source of inspiration, the master chocolatiers have used the most premium ingredients to combine different flavours with delicious dark chocolates. The Fabelle Elements Collection – Fire has managed to create a successful balance of complex flavours. The Fabelle Fire chocolate bar contains an excellent dark chocolate shell filled with silky White Mousse and Ancho Chilli filling. Fabelle Fire offers chocolate lovers a chance to take their senses on one of the most exhilarating experiences ever created.

entry.title: Aashirvaad Sugar Release Control Atta 1kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: Aashirvaad Atta
Type: Foods
Price: 57.60

The AASHIRVAAD Sugar Release Control Atta is a ‘Natural Grain Mix’ of whole wheat Atta and several other healthy grain flours. It is one of the best atta options for diabetics due to its low Glycaemic Index. This slows down the sugar release in the human body which is highly beneficial for diabetics. Additionally, it also has severalnutritional benefits for all people owing to the presence of oats, methi, and other multigrain flours in this blend.

Key Information:

  • Main Ingredients: AASHIRVAAD Sugar Release Control Atta has been designed with an optimal focus on retaining a ‘Low Glycaemic Index.’ This product contains whole wheat atta (84.5%), multigrain flour mixture (15.4%), and Fenugreek Seed Powder (0.1%)
  • Suitable For: This is ideal Atta for diabetics to enjoy their favourite food dishes without having to worry about their blood sugar. Alternatively, it can be used by any health-conscious individual and family. Its health benefits and superior nutrition can be a great addition to a healthy diet for everyone.
  • Usage: AASHIRVAAD Sugar Release Control Atta can be used for a variety of dishes that are commonly made in Indian households and much more. It is an excellent substitute for whole wheat Atta and can be used to prepare delicious fluffy rotis, parathas, and puris. Furthermore, many special delicacies such as Sweet Pumpkin Puri, Whole Wheat Barfi, and Fried Whole Modaks can also be prepared with this healthy atta.
  • Quantity: A 1kg pack of AASHIRVAAD Sugar Release Control Atta has enough quantity to make approximately 30-35 medium-sized rotis for a small family. A 1kg pack provides enough atta to prepare enough rotis for 4-5 days for a small family.


The AASHIRVAAD Sugar Release Control Atta is a unique combination of flours to ensure it has a ‘Low Glycaemic Index.’ The mixture of high-quality whole wheat flour and legume and pulses flour results in a ‘Natural Grain Mix.’ Foods prepared with this Atta help release the sugar slowly into the body. This proves incredibly beneficial to diabetics, allowing them much better blood glucose control. In addition to being helpful to diabetics, AASHIRVAAD Sugar Release Control Atta also helps fitness enthusiasts regulate their diets much better. Improved weight management is one of the core health benefits of this product. It is the perfect substitute for regular whole wheat atta, making it an ideal product for diabetics and even other fitness-oriented individuals.

Presenting Aashirvaad Instant Meals, which brings you the taste that takes you home. Just add hot water and wait for a few minutes, and your favourite breakfast is ready to satisfy your home-food cravings! Conveniently packed in a cup, you can now relish the taste of home, anytime and anywhere. Nobody knows the efforts that go into making a home meal like Aashirvaad. We have given your mother’s nurturance a modern twist and created a range of breakfast and snacking meals that are made with the goodness of grains and vegetables. Instantly made, you can enjoy the convenience of having it anytime and anywhere. Just like your mother would put that extra love to her dishes that brought out that delicious taste, we put in our love and care to bring to you these instant dishes that taste just like home!

  • Enjoy the range : Khatta Meetha Poha with Millets, Veggie Upma,Mini Idli Sambhar and Suji Halwa with Jaggery

entry.title: Kitchens of India Ready to Eat NAVRATAN KORMA - Heat and Eat, Indian Meal
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kitchens of India
Type: Foods
Price: 104.00

Enjoy a meal with the Kitchens of India Navratan Korma.  This is 100% natural and contains no preservatives. The delicate balance of seasoning and ingredients is carefully preserved in this specialized packaging form.   

  • No Preservatives
  • No colours & No artificial flavours
  • Our products are preservative free made with top quality ingredients to give you the best taste without compromise

Key Features

Pre-packaged ready meals for consumption anytime, anywhere

How to use

"Just Heat & Heat!

  • Cut pouch and empty contents into a pan, heat for 3-5 minutes while stirring. Serve hot.
  • Cut pouch & empty contents into a microwave dish and head in a microwave at High for 1-2 minutes. Serve hot.
  • Immerse the inner foil pouch in boiling water for 3-5 minutes. Cut open and serve hot. "

entry.title: ITC Master Chef Crispy French Fries 420g
entry.summary:
Vendor: ITC Master Chef Frozen Snacks
Type: Frozen Snacks
Price: 95.00

Bring home the joy of perfectly cut, and ready-to-cook ITC Master Chef Crispy French Fries. Made with the finest quality of potatoes, these frozen French Fries are a classic snack that can be at your service in a matter of minutes. Quell your cravings with the most fitting comfort food bymaking yourself a plate full of beautiful, golden French Fries with the help of ITC Master Chef.

Key Information

  • Main Ingredients: ITC Master Chef Crispy French Fries are made with a special variety of potatoes. They are cut into the classic shape of French Fries. Ready to cook and serve, ITC Master Chef Crispy French Fries are unseasoned to allow the consumer to add salt or masala as per their preference.
  • Suitable For: French Fries are a universally loved snack because they can be customized by any person based on their choice of sauce, or dip. ITC Master Chef Crispy French Fries are an excellent option for anyone to enjoy homemade French Fries in a matter of minutes.
  • Usage: ITC Master Chef Crispy French Fries are an awesome snack that you can cook in a variety of different ways based on your preference. You can deep fry, air fry and even bake these frozen French Fries to perfection. Serve your ITC Master Chef Crispy French Fries with your choice of sauces and dips such as tomato ketchup, mayonnaise, barbecue sauce and more. You can also serve these frozen fries as a side with several dishes such as burgers, sandwiches, wraps, and make more exciting recipes such as Honey Chilli Potato and Fries Pizza.
  • Quantity: This pack of ITC Master Chef Crispy French Fries weighs 420g. This quantity is sufficient for a small family to share with each other and enjoy the goodness of beautiful golden fries whenever they like.

ITC Master Chef Crispy French Fries is part of an illustrious and diverse range of vegetarian and non-vegetarian ready to cook, frozen snacks. The Crispy French Fries are a beloved snack, and side dish that can be served with a wide variety of foods. With No Added Preservative, and made with the highest quality ingredients, ITC Master Chef Crispy French Fries are the ideal choice for your home. ITC Master Chef frozen French Fries is the saviour you can depend on when you and your loved ones desire a steaming hot plate of crisp, perfect fries.

entry.title: Sunfeast YiPPee! Power Up Atta Noodles 280g (4 in 1 Pack)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sunfeast YiPPee! Noodles
Type: Foods
Price: 68.80

A bowl of wheat atta noodles is the best healthy snack to enjoy within a matter of minutes. WithYiPPee! Atta Noodles, the wholesomeness of wheat and real vegetables join forces to power up your day. With YiPPee Power UpAtta Noodles, you can get the energy and nutrition to do great things and be a true champion. To make it more than just a bowl of tasty instant noodles, Sunfeast YiPPee! Atta Noodles brings together the perfect blend of masala and all-natural ingredients.

Key Information:

  • Main Ingredients: Sunfeast YiPPee! Power Up Masala Noodles are made from Wheat Flour (Atta).
  • Suitable For: This product is suitable for all healthy individuals and fitness-oriented consumers who love to snack on instant masala noodles. Sunfeast YiPPee! Power Up Masala contains Atta noodles that are healthier and more nutritious than regular Maida-based instant noodles. It is an excellent source of energy and micronutrients for people leading an active lifestyle and wants more from their bowl of noodles. Young students, working professionals, and homemakers can enjoy this tasty, healthy, and filling snack.
  • Usage: YiPPee! Atta Noodles can be used to prepare a scrumptious bowl of instant noodles for the perfect snack. Fresh vegetables like peas, carrots, green beans, and spring onions can be added to spice things up further.
  • Quantity: One pack of YiPPee! Power Up Atta noodles 280g contains four blocks of instant wheat noodles and four packs of tastemakers. This quantity is enough to prepare four standard bowls of instant noodles for a family of four.

Lip-smacking instant noodles have been an ever-popular snacking option for children and adults alike. With Sunfeast YiPPee! Power Up Masala Noodles, the combination of great taste and good health is now a possibility. The rich texture of the wheat noodles is packed with nutrition and goodness. It has also been infused with real vegetables in every strand. Each pack of wheat atta noodles from Sunfeast YiPPee! is packed with dietary fibre, protein, and loads of micronutrients. It is a rich source of calcium and iron which are highly beneficial for the human body. Together, the scrumptious taste of zesty masala along with long, non-sticky noodles and the promise of healthy nutrition make Sunfeast YiPPee!Atta noodles the perfect snack for everyone.
